meanings.definition: A shot in basketball made from a position close to the basket, typically using one hand.
meanings.sent1: He practiced his layups every day to improve his basketball skills.
meanings.sent2: During the game, she scored two points with a perfect layup.
meanings.sent3: The coach joked that if they missed their layups, they would have to run extra laps.
meanings.sent4: Her layup was like a gentle kiss on the rim, softly dropping into the net.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ball swishing through the hoop after his layup was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: The act of laying something up, such as a basketball.
meanings.sent1: His layups of basketballs in the storage room were neatly organized.
meanings.sent2: She completed the layups of the supplies on the shelves before closing the store.
meanings.sent3: The layups of the books on the table made it look tidy and inviting.
meanings.sent4: The layups of the bricks in the construction site were done with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: His layups of the groceries in the pantry made it easy to find everything quickly.
